mapper.sql: id, username, password, transfer_money, trans_billno, trans_status, trans_type, trans_before_money, trans_after_money, live_id, live_type, trans_record_id, finger, remark, create_time, update_time, versions, site_id
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT IFNULL( IF( a.live_id = 90 AND a.live_type = 'ky', b.trans_mapping_billno, a.trans_billno ),'') AS trans_billno, a.id, a.username, a.password, a.transfer_money, a.trans_status, a.trans_type, a.trans_before_money, a.trans_after_money, a.live_id, a.live_type, a.trans_record_id, a.finger, a.remark, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.versions, a.site_id FROM transfer_record AS a LEFT JOIN transfer_other_rule AS b ON a.trans_billno = b.trans_center_billno WHERE a.trans_record_id = #{transRecordId} ORDER BY a.id ASC

SELECT
distinct
from transfer_record AS a WHERE a.trans_status = '20' AND a.live_id NOT IN (15, 17, 2, 3, 90) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM transfer_record AS b WHERE b.trans_status = '20' AND b.live_id IN (2, 3, 90) AND ROUND( (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.create_time))/ 60 ) >= 4
